details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.8.3 JPEG2000 - Colour specification method
details.description: The value of the METH entry in its 'colr' box shall be 0x01, 0x02 or 0x03. A conforming reader shall use only that colour space and shall ignore all other colour space specifications.
